channel.title: CVE Feed for Brainstorm Force -- Spectra
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brainstorm Force -- Spectra

item.title: CVE-2023-36676|2024-08-02T16:52:54.300Z -- brainstorm%20force -- spectra
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Brainstorm Force Spectra.This issue affects Spectra: from n/a through 2.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-36679|2024-08-02T16:52:54.310Z -- brainstorm%20force -- spectra
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Brainstorm Force Spectra.This issue affects Spectra: from n/a through 2.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-23730|2024-07-25T13:30:51.929Z -- brainstorm%20force -- spectra
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Brainstorm Force Spectra allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Spectra: from n/a through 2.3.0.
